meanings.definition: To surpass or outdo in performance or achievement.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys besting her own high score in the game.
meanings.sent2: He is besting his previous record in the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was besting all the other animals in the nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: The student was besting all expectations with her project presentation.
meanings.sent5: The sun was besting the clouds, shining brightly in the sky.

meanings.definition: To defeat or overcome in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The team is besting their opponents in the basketball game.
meanings.sent2: She was besting her fear of heights by climbing higher each time.
meanings.sent3: The cat was besting the dog in the race to the food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The knight was besting the dragon in the epic battle.
meanings.sent5: The superhero was besting the villain with her quick thinking and agility.
